summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Games/Sub-Games/Maps system for iteration 8. All backend API endpoints working correctly. Frontend GamesPage shows sub-games, maps, and admin controls properly. CreateTournamentPage has working sub-game selection and map pool. TeamDetailPage exists with tournament history tab.

issues: Maps show 'Nicht für 1v1' grayed out correctly when mode is incompatible - working as expected

passed_tests: GET /api/games - Returns all games with sub_games and maps (14 games, 7 versions, 34 maps)
CoD game has 3 sub-games (Black Ops 6, Modern Warfare 3, Black Ops Cold War) with 18 maps total
CS2 game has Premier sub-game with 7 maps
Valorant game has Ranked sub-game with 9 maps
POST /api/games/{game_id}/sub-games - Create sub-game works (admin only)
PUT /api/games/{game_id}/sub-games/{sub_game_id} - Update sub-game works
DELETE /api/games/{game_id}/sub-games/{sub_game_id} - Delete sub-game works
POST /api/games/{game_id}/sub-games/{sub_game_id}/maps - Create map works
PUT /api/games/{game_id}/sub-games/{sub_game_id}/maps/{map_id} - Update map works
DELETE /api/games/{game_id}/sub-games/{sub_game_id}/maps/{map_id} - Delete map works
GET /api/games/{game_id}/sub-games - Get sub-games list works
GET /api/games/{game_id}/sub-games/{sub_game_id}/maps - Get maps list works
POST /api/upload/image - Image upload endpoint exists (requires admin, rejects without file)
GET /api/matches/{match_id}/map-veto - Returns 404 for non-existent match (endpoint exists)
POST /api/admin/smtp-test - Returns detailed SMTP test results
GET /api/teams/{id}/tournaments - Returns tournament history (tested with ARES Organization)
GamesPage - Shows all games with sub-game count, map count, and modes
GamesPage - Clicking game card expands to show modes, sub-games, maps
GamesPage - Each sub-game shows its maps with game modes badges
GamesPage - Admin sees edit/delete buttons on games, sub-games, maps
GamesPage - Category filters (FPS, Sports, etc.) working
CreateTournamentPage - Game selection shows sub-games dropdown
CreateTournamentPage - Sub-game selection (Version wählen) populated with options like Black Ops 6
CreateTournamentPage - Map pool selection shows maps from selected sub-game
CreateTournamentPage - Maps filtered by game mode compatibility
seed_data_creation: None - using existing seed data with CoD, CS2, Valorant sub-games/maps
context_for_next_testing_agent: Games/Sub-Games/Maps system is fully working. GamesPage at /games shows hierarchical game structure with sub-games and maps. CreateTournamentPage at /tournaments/create has working sub-game and map pool selection. Admin controls visible when logged in. All backend CRUD endpoints for sub-games and maps are functional.

mocked_api.PayPal: MOCKED - PayPal integration is mocked as noted in requirements

screenshots_taken: games_page_expanded.png - Shows CoD expanded with 3 sub-games listed
games_page_maps.png - Shows Black Ops 6 maps (Nuketown, Hacienda, etc.)
games_page_admin.png - Shows admin controls (edit pencil, + Spiel hinzufügen)
create_tournament_game_selected.png - Shows CoD selected with modes (1v1, 2v2, etc.)
create_tournament_subgame.png - Shows sub-game selector with Black Ops 6 selected
create_tournament_maps.png - Shows map pool selection grid
